definition: to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot

sentences.english: And the pump has a wooden handle to prevent burns to the hands.
sentences.chinese: 而且抽气筒还安有一个木制的把手用来防止手被烫伤。

sentences.english: He was scalded by the steam from the kettle.
sentences.chinese: 他被水壶里的蒸汽烫伤了。

sentences.english: 'Not on the highest setting or you might burn up the leather, ' he notes.
sentences.chinese: 他说，不要把风力开到最高档，否则可能会烫伤皮面。

sentences.english: What's the first thing you do when you burn or cut one of your hands?
sentences.chinese: 当你不小心烫伤或者割伤了手，你首先会做什么呢？

sentences.english: I happened to touch a hot pan and burnt my finger.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心碰到热锅上，把手给烫伤了。

sentences.english: Slurping noodles is not entirely for the sake of politeness, but also to avoid having a burnt tongue.
sentences.chinese: 吸溜面条不但是为礼貌，而且还为了避免烫伤舌头。

sentences.english: We always suggest our Wonder-Full Balm for scuffs, cuts and little burns.
sentences.chinese: 我们总是建议使用奇迹修复霜用于刀伤烫伤。

sentences.english: The treatment for burns and scalds is the same.
sentences.chinese: 治疗烧伤和烫伤的方法是相同的。

sentences.english: Hot coffee can give first-degree burns .
sentences.chinese: 热咖啡能造成一度烫伤。

sentences.english: For burns or scalds , drop Tea Tree oil directly on the effected area.
sentences.chinese: 在烧伤或烫伤后，直接滴茶树精油在创口部位。

sentences.english: The medicine is easy to prepare and is ideal for treating the burn and the scald.
sentences.chinese: 本发明药物制作工艺简单，是治疗烧烫伤的理想药物。

sentences.english: What do I do with burns and scalds?
Some people self-injure by burning their skin with the end of a cigarette or lighted match.
sentences.chinese: 也有人通过烟头或点着的火柴烫伤自己。

sentences.english: Anger is a hot bath that scalds and makes you scream.
sentences.chinese: 生气是洗热水澡被烫伤发出的尖叫。

sentences.english: The invention relates to medicine used for treating burn and scald and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种用于治疗烧烫伤的药物及其生产方法。

sentences.english: Overheated food either the drink, will scald or puncture the olive inside the mouth directly to drill thrust out.
sentences.chinese: 过热的食品或饮料，会直接烫伤或刺橄口内钻腆。

definition: a burn (tissue damage from heat, chemicals etc)/to burn (the skin etc)/(fig.) (of anger, jealousy etc) to hurt (sb)
to damage by scratching/to gash/to lacerate
to injure oneself in a fall
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
